```{r config, echo = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.path = "figs/"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)

library(evoteams)
data("leaderboards")

leaderboards %<>%
  group_by(slug) %>%
  arrange(desc(Score)) %>%
  mutate(Place = 1:n()) %>%
  ungroup
```

```{r leaderboards}
ggplot(leaderboards, aes(Entries, Place)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = slug), alpha = 0.4) +
  guides(color = "none") +
  xlab("Iterations of final solution") +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.ticks = element_blank()
  )
```
